text: Music must take rank as the highest of the fine arts - as the one which, more than any other, ministers to the human spirit.
author: Herbert Spencer

text: A lot of music is mathematics. It's balance.
author: Mel Brooks

text: I think that a song, when it works, never mind a piece of long form music, even a song is something that speaks to itself but has a language all of its own, ideally.
author: Steve Hackett

text: I'm not trying to clock scores in this lifetime, it's just that things are better now than they were like five, ten years ago. Music has gotten a lot better. There's a lot of people who are committed to - soulfully.
author: Jerry Garcia

text: If not for music, I would probably be a very frustrated scientist. It's one way to answer the question, 'What is the meaning of life?' I feel music answers it better.
author: Paula Cole
